fomod.Name: SexLab Separate Orgasm
fomod.Author: Ed86
fomod.Description:
Mod that adds some interactivity to Skyrim SexLab - Sex Animation Framework
Requirements: Skyrim SexLab - Sex Animation Framework SKYUI SKSE
useful hot-keys: SPACE!!! - advance animation stage shift+SPACE!!! - go back 1 animation stage O - switch animation End - End animation
